name: Current Cycle
description: This is the first cycle.  It will be the testing ground for everything else.

name: Shaping
description: This is the place where we have all of our current product development that are not associated with a larger project.

name: Staff
description: Private category for staff discussions. Topics are only visible to admins and moderators.

name: Meta
description: This space is for the maintenance and updates of this space. Since this is a place that TransitChat is maintaining to support the communication of its staff and customers about work and upcoming features. It is important for us to maintain this space as a place we can call our digital HQ.
